> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25044?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [4cbee17...6f401e4](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/25044?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

I didn't find any direct issues related to refactoring/cleaning to_pickle. The closest issue is regarding how far back we should be supporting pickles from prior editions. https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/19581

Here the asv for the pickle benchmarks.

```
$ asv continuous -f 1.1 upstream/master HEAD -b io.pickle.Pickle
· Creating environments
· Discovering benchmarks
· Running 4 total benchmarks (2 commits * 1 environments * 2 benchmarks)
[  0.00%] · For pandas commit da5f5eb6 <master> (round 1/2):

[ 25.00%] · For pandas commit 35c1fc0c <to_pickle_cleanup> (round 1/2):
[ 25.00%] ·· Building for conda-py3.6-Cython-matplotlib-numexpr-numpy-openpyxl-pytables-pytest-scipy-sqlalchemy-xlrd-xlsxwriter-xlwt....

[ 62.50%] ··· io.pickle.Pickle.time_read_pickle                                                                                16.2±2ms
[ 75.00%] ··· io.pickle.Pickle.time_write_pickle                                                                             19.5±0.8ms
[ 75.00%] · For pandas commit da5f5eb6 <master> (round 2/2):
[ 75.00%] ·· Building for conda-py3.6-Cython-matplotlib-numexpr-numpy-openpyxl-pytables-pytest-scipy-sqlalchemy-xlrd-xlsxwriter-xlwt....
```
